document.title: Technical Bulletins: Cities Required to Extend Health Insurance Coverage to Former Employees and Dependents
document.abstract: The COBRA law creates an opportunity for people to retain health insurance by requiring employers to extend the coverage that the employee or dependent had immediately before qualifying for continuation coverage.
